short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all mentions of 2016 US Presidential Candidate names with happier alternatives.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't get us wrong. It's good to stay informed on the future of our great nation, but these candidates engage in some bat-shit crazy nonsense that is more annoying than helpful to read about. Sometimes you just need a freakin' break.
